tuv.seg: “我好看么？”磁性的男人声音仿若下了蛊一般，充满着魅惑。
"Am I so good looking?" The magnetic voice of a man seemingly cast a spell on her and sounded full of seductive charm.
“栩栩姐，这么急干什么？”
"Sister Xuxu, why are you in such a hurry?"
“温栩栩，你装什么害羞，又不是没看过。”被异性看光了身体，言boss不但没有惊叫，反而很淡定的嘲笑温栩栩，“小时候我们还一起洗过澡，你忘了？”

"Wen Xuxu, what are you acting all shy for? It's not like you've never seen this before." After getting his entire body looked at by someone of the opposite gender, not only did Boss Yan not exclaim out, he even mocked at Wen Xuxu in a very calm manner. "When we were young, didn't we also bath together? Have you forgotten that already?"
“温秘书，你在听吗？
"Secretary Wen, are you listening?
“言总。”
"CEO Yan."
“言总，你电话，情况很紧急。”
"CEO Yan, you have a call. It seems to be very urgent."
一个高大的肉色身影正好从卫生间里出来。
A large nude-colored figure was just stepping out of the bathroom as well.
一尘不染的大理石地面，倒映着温栩栩纤细苗条的身影，她两只手各拿着一部荣盛最新版的手机，腋下还夹着一个蓝色的文件夹，脚步急促的往总裁办公室方向走。

On the spotless marble flooring, Wen Xuxu's slender figure could be seen reflecting off it. She was holding the latest cell phone model from Rongsheng in each of her hands as she walked hastily towards the CEO's office with a blue file tucked under her arms.
一时间不知道怎么办，惊愣住了，视线盯在男人，久久的没有移开。
In a moment of panic, she just stood there looking stunned. Her eyes met with the man as she did not move away for the longest time.
下一秒她听到了‘啪’的一声，手机不知道砸到什么地方了，反正肯定是碎了。
Immediately at the next moment, she heard a "plop". The phone must have hit something and sounded like it had definitely broke.***
两人之间发生矛盾她从来不争论，她都是直接动手。
Whenever a conflict arose between the two of them, she would never argue. She was always a direct hands-on person about such things.
人未到，声音先到，就省的敲门了。
Before she could see him, his voice already sounded out. There was no need to knock anymore.
他的声音很好听，特别是像此时，带着几分笑意，如陈年佳酿，让人陶醉。
His voice was very nice, especially when it sounded like the way it did now. With a trace of some laughter, it was especially enchanting to hear.
反正争论后的结果，吃亏的还是她。
She would always be on the losing end anyway if there was an argument.
右手上拿着的白色手机还处于通话中，电话那边甜美的女音有些不耐的催促着她。
The phone in her right hand was active in call and the sweet voice of a woman could be heard urging at her with some impatience.
听到这一声响，温栩栩心里别提有多痛快了。
When she heard that sound, Wen Xuxu couldn't mention how happy she felt on the inside.
喊了一声没有人回应她，她目光扫向主卧室门口。
After calling out to him and getting no response, her gaze swept to the master bedroom door.
她没有看到言如生的身影。
She didn't see Yan Rusheng around.
她赶紧转过身背对着身材精壮的男人，“言总，你电话，欧阳小姐打来的，说有紧急的事情，务必要找到你。”

She quickly turned around with her back facing the man with a well-toned physique (ripped body) and said, "CEO Yan, there's a call for you. It's from Miss Ouyang. She says it's something urgent that she has to look for you about."
怎么还没有找到言总吗？”
Have you not found CEO Yan yet?"
总裁办公室是两室一厅的套房，简单的欧美风，灰白系列的家具，烟灰色烤瓷面的办公桌，白色的老板椅，身后是整面墙的落地窗，窗外是小半个城市的景色。

The CEO's office was a two-bedroomed, one-living room suite that was decorated simply with a European flair and was matched with a gray-white furniture series. An ash-gray porcelain desk and a white director's chair sat in front of floor-to-ceiling windows that spanned across the wall. Outside, the view of half the city could be seen.
所以公司里除了那些老字辈的领导，其余所有的员工无论年龄大小，都尊称她‘栩栩姐’。
As such, other than those veterans in leadership roles at the company, everyone else would respectfully address her as Sister Xuxu no matter how young or old they were.
所以此时此刻，她还是选择忍，交代了一句，然后飞快的离开了言如生的房间。
Thus at this moment now, she could only choose to endure it and pass the message to Yan Rusheng before quickly leaving his room.
所谓肉色身影就是……一丝不挂。
By nude-colored here...it just meant fully nude.
打不过他的时候，她就忍着。
If she could not beat him, then she'd just have to bear with it.
最强宠婚：腹黑老公傲娇萌妻
Uber Pampered Marriage: Black-bellied Husband, Tsundere Wife!
果然，房门是开着的。
Sure enough, the door was open.
毕业后又被老董事长亲自聘请进荣盛，任总裁的秘书，也就是言大boss的秘书。
After her graduation, she had been personally hired by the old chairman into Rongsheng to be the CEO's secretary, which meant she was Big Boss Yan's secretary.
温栩栩回过神，漂亮的脸蛋瞬间爆红，像充了血一样。
Wen Xuxu came back to her senses immediately. Her beautiful face instantly flushed red, almost as though she had a rush of blood to her head.
温栩栩正犹豫要不要去房间把电话给言如生。
Wen Xuxu was hesitating whether to go into the room to pass the phone to Yan Rusheng.
温栩栩皱眉，也很不耐烦的回了一句，“马上。”
Wen Xuxu frowned as she also answered back impatiently, "I'm getting to him immediately."
温栩栩笑着对那问她话的人摆了摆手里的手机，“总裁电话。”
Wen Xuxu smiled at that person who asked her that question and waved the cell phone in her hand. "A call for the CEO."
然后拧开门锁，推开了门进去。
Thereafter, she turned the doorknob and pushed it open before going in.
第1章 装什么害羞
Chapter 1: What are you acting all shy for?
第2章 亏他还说小时候
Chapter 2: To think that he would even bring up the past
荣盛里，没有人不知道她和大boss言如生是发小，跟大boss上的一所幼儿园，一所小学，一所中学，就连大学也都是在B城上的。

In Rongsheng, no one did not know about her being the childhood friend of the big boss, Yan Rusheng. She had attended the same kindergarten, the same primary school, and the same secondary school. She even attended university in B-city with him.***
言如生从小到大在温栩栩的心目中的形象一直是‘流氓’，毒舌又腹黑，还很花心。

Yan Rusheng has always had the image of a "scoundrel" in Wen Xuxu's impression of him since they were young. He had a venomous tongue and was a black-bellied kinda guy too. And to top that off, he was also very fickle with his heart.
让你一大早沾污我的眼睛。
Who told you to pollute my eyes so early in the morning.
话音落，人已经踏进了房间。
Just as she finished speaking, she had already stepped into the room.
说着她把手机往后一抛。
Saying that, she threw the cell phone backwards.
说着她脚步朝主卧室门口走去。
Saying that, her footsteps headed towards the master bedroom door.
说话间她已经到了总裁办公室门口，伸手敲了两下门。
As she spoke, she already reached the front of the CEO's office. She reached her hand out and knocked on the door twice.
